definition: to think of/to keep thinking about/to be concerned about
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: With an eye out for lake deposits, I went back to get samples a few days later.
sentences.chinese: 惦记着湖泊沉积，几天后我又回去取了样本。

sentences.english: With seven mouths and eight tongues, all were talking together. They tried to tell how they had missed him.
sentences.chinese: 男男女女都七嘴八舌地说出他们的惦记和盼念。

sentences.english: Forget rubbing elbows with strangers at networking mixers .
sentences.chinese: 别惦记着和社交网站的陌生人拉关系。

sentences.english: In combat, one lives in the now and does not think much about yesterday or tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 战斗中，此刻尚存者别想昨天，也别惦记明天。

sentences.english: She will always have something to remember you by while you are away.
sentences.chinese: 即使你不在她身边时母亲总会惦记着你。

sentences.english: Was there any use buying Dilcey if she was going to mope about the child?
sentences.chinese: 只买来迪尔茜，要是她整天惦记孩子，又有什么用呢？

sentences.english: Mr Li is unlikely still to be thinking about this little setback.
sentences.chinese: 李先生不太可能还惦记着这个小小的挫折。

sentences.english: Once throne eyes gaze, age face a dark, remember the human into blacklist.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝眼睛一瞪，老脸一黑，就把人惦记入黑名单了。

sentences.english: My heart cared about everyone, it just couldn't take care of itself.
sentences.chinese: 我的心惦记每个人，但它就是没能照顾好自己。

sentences.english: Though rarely seen during the election campaign, Canadians have China on their minds.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大人心头惦记着中国，这在选举期间是少见的。

sentences.english: LL: I'd be psyched if you left behind that new leather couch you got for Christmas last year.
sentences.chinese: 原来你在惦记我去年圣诞节买的新沙发。

sentences.english: She is dead now herself, but many still living remember her.
sentences.chinese: 她现在已经死了，却仍为很多在世的人所惦记。

sentences.english: We shall miss her; but SHE will be happy.
sentences.chinese: 我们会惦记她的，不过她会很幸福。

sentences.english: Kurita had one more major factor to bear in mind .
sentences.chinese: 栗田还惦记着一个重大的决胜因素。

sentences.english: But you, O my brothers, remember sometimes thy little Alex that was.
sentences.chinese: 而你们，弟兄们哪，要不时惦记小亚历克斯哥们啊。

sentences.english: I've been thinking about that all the time.

definition: to constantly have (sb or sth) on one's mind
to worry about/to be concerned about
to worry/to be on one's mind
to miss/to remember with longing/to long to see again
to hate to do sth/to hate to part with/to begrudge
(coll.) to be eager for/to long for/to look forward to
to talk about often/to reminisce about/to keep repeating/to keep harping on/to discuss
carefully/meticulously/to set one's heart on sth
not to have room to put sth/to be unable to let go
to bother about/to haggle/to bicker/to argue/plan/stratagem
rare/uncommon/rarity/to value as a rarity/to cherish/Taiwan pr. [xi1 han3]
